title: Sarah Richardson Oyster Dishy Sterling Silver Earrings
description:
The Oyster Dishy Sterling Silver Earring is hand carved in wax and cast in recycled sterling silver. Each piece is heated to a bright white sterling, with a high polished edge. Sarah Richardson’s collection ranges from everyday simple to extraordinary. The organic nature of her jewelry finds balance and symmetry through replication. Each piece is finely crafted in California using traditional metalsmithing techniques in precious metals.

Size:  0.5 in. D Pods X 0.9 in. L

Please note:  Each piece is unique, dimensions may vary.
